page.title: 03 POPULATION STABILITY
page.content: Up to 20 years ago most people in Betley and the surrounding districts had lived all,or most, of their lives in the area.Most worked on farms or in factories in Crewe.Today most people in the area outside Betley village have lived in the area a long time.However many new large expensive houses have been built in the village and many people have moved in from other parts of the country.36% of our sample have lived in Betley less than five years, 30% less than 20 years and 34% lived here all their lives.Of the newcomers 36% are from other parts of Staffordshire.48% of people work in Newcastle and Stoke,22% in Crewe and Cheshire and 20% work in Betley.10% travel over 20 miles to work.90% travel to work by car.26% of workers are in executive jobs,13% are teachers,14% work in factories and 5% on farms.
